name: ts-rest-api-playground_server
description: CRUD RESTful API built with TypeScript + Node.js + Postgresql + Docker

scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build:docker-img
scripts.build: npm run docker:compile && npm run docker:copy-files
scripts.build:ssl: cd src/sslcert && npx mkcert -cert-file app.cert -key-file app.key yourdomain.com *.yourdomain.com localhost ::1 0.0.0.0 127.0.0.1  && echo 'SSL Certificate created'
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:copy-files: npx copyfiles -a -u 1 src/public/**.** src/sslcert/**.** dist/ && echo 'Files copied to the dist folder'
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:down && docker rm ts-rest-api-playground_server -f && docker image rm ts-rest-api-playground_server-image:latest -f && docker volume rm api-database-vol -f
scripts.docker:logs: docker logs ts-rest-api-playground_server && docker logs ts-rest-api-playground_database

author: Alexandre Gimenez (algife.com)
